pages.text: Skills are a crucial part of the player's build.$(br2)The Skill Altar is used to store both $(l)Talents$() and $(l)Abilities$().$(br2)A maximum of $(l)5 different$() builds can be saved. These skills are saved $(l)per player$(), not per Skill Altar.

pages.title: Skill Altar
pages.text: Builds can be $(l)saved$() at $(l)no cost$().$(br2)$(l)Swapping$() between different builds can be done at the cost of a $(l)small$() percentage of $(l)Regret Orbs$().
